ncs__HtbCareerTips: Some airlines and private providers run 2-day cabin crew courses, which may help your chances of getting a job.
ncs__CareerPathAndProgression:
With experience, you could progress to cabin crew supervisor or a senior air cabin crew role.

You could also work in a ground-based role like cabin crew training, recruitment, passenger services, marketing or sales.
ncs__HtbFurtherInformation: You'll find details about working as air cabin crew from Careers That Move.
ncs__Description: Air cabin crew help make sure that airline passengers have a comfortable, safe and pleasant flight.
ncs__WitDigitalSkillsLevel: to be able to carry out basic tasks on a computer or hand-held device
